title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database, column icons are not appearing in the Available Items section.
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items section by clicking the related icon, the column icons do not show up.
EB: The expected result is that when expanding the Data Source in the Available Items section by clicking the related icon, both table icons and column icons should appear.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the application and connect to a Derby database.
2. In the Available Items section, expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon.
3. Observe that the column icons do not appear.
